SUBTITLE: Fullstack Developer

PROYECTS.descripcion: Wordle was a hit in the 2022 game trend for a while, and I thought about making a Wordle... but with Pokemon instead!
A simple online screen recorder that allows you to record your screen and download the video to your PC.
A secure Password Generator, if you want a secure password so that you can make sure that your account is safe as possible, you can use this tool to help you.
A simple To Do App made with pure JS, CSS & HTML
Pomodoro is a technique of concentrating that I often opt when studying. Then I decided to make my own Pomodoro desktop app with Electron.
A simple gallery made with React. All of the images have no copyright and were put free to use in Unsplash.

JAP ('Jovenes a Programar') is an Uruguayan program that teaches the young people of the country to code, this was a project-based learing experience in wich we had to figure out how to make certain aspects of the webpage.
A weather application, made with vanilla JavaScript and Bootstrap, which makes use of the free OpenWeather API.

COURSES.descripcion: Learn web development with HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, ES6 React and Node
Context API, MERN, Hooks, Firestore, JWT, Testing, Autenticaciones, Despliegues, CRUD, Logs, MUI, Multiple Routers...
Learn the main languages that dominate the Internet: JavaScript, HTML5 and CSS3.

ABOUT: I am a 21 years old fullstack developer from Uruguay, currently coursing a degree in Computer Science at the ORT University while working at TCS Uruguay. I love learning new technologies and I'm always looking for new challenges to improve my skills.
